course_title: Introduction to Python Programming: A Beginner's Guide to Coding
course_description: Start your programming journey by learning Python from scratch. Build a solid foundation in core concepts, write your first programs, and gain the skills to automate tasks and solve problems.
course_overview: This comprehensive beginner course is your first step into the world of programming. You will learn the fundamental concepts of Python, one of the world's most popular and versatile programming languages. Through hands-on exercises and practical projects, you'll master core syntax, data structures, and control flow. The course culminates in building a simple, functional application, giving you the confidence and foundational knowledge to continue your development journey.
target_audience: Absolute beginners with no prior coding experience, students, and professionals seeking to add technical skills.
learning_outcomes: Explain the core syntax and basic constructs of the Python language
Write simple Python scripts to perform calculations and manipulate data
Apply control flow logic using conditional statements and loops
Develop small programs by combining core concepts to solve defined problems
